column4: I wasnt paying attention to my battery and the laptop died...im on my PC now , laptop is rebooting (this is ben)
that is being set in either /etc/profile, ~/.bash_profile or ~/.bashrc
are you still there? im having trouble changing the setting...not sure what im doing
I dont see it in any of those three files
have you rebooted or logged out/in since you removed the proxy software?
I have no idea, its being set somewhere but I don't know where
aptget cant resolve us.archive.ubuntu.com...same sorta error
I'm out of ideas, try creating a test user and see if the problem exists for that user, that will tell you if the setting is local to your user
